table.name: vtiger_actions
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_actions` ( `actionsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `reference` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `actions_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `actions_status` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `actions_language` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `subject` text, `template` text, `tags` text ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_actionscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_actionscf` ( `actionsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`actionsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
